item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Gukesh Becomes the Youngest Chess World Champion in History (75 points | 33 comments)
2. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (264 points | 54 comments)
3. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (311 points | 107 comments)
4. Ethical Challenges Related to the NeurIPS 2024 Best Paper Award (3 points | discuss)
5. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (625 points | 228 comments)
6. Certain names make ChatGPT grind to a halt, and we know why (199 points | 114 comments)
7. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (851 points | 430 comments)
8. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (349 points | 554 comments)
9. I'm daily driving Jujutsu, and maybe you should too (61 points | 24 comments)
10. Infracost (YC W21) Is Hiring a Founding Solutions Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
11. Show HN: Quantus – LeetCode for Financial Modeling (6 points | 2 comments)
12. 12,419 days of Strandbeest evolution [video] (67 points | 5 comments)
13. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (156 points | 28 comments)
14. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (411 points | 138 comments)
15. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (209 points | 42 comments)
16. Review of Mullvad VPN (382 points | 145 comments)
17. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (289 points | 380 comments)
18. How a middle schooler found a new compound in a piece of goose poop (5 points | 3 comments)
19. The Cold Email Handbook (261 points | 141 comments)
20. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (236 points | 45 comments)
21. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (39 points | 6 comments)
22. Dear OAuth Providers (291 points | 82 comments)
23. The GPU is not always faster (172 points | 86 comments)
24. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (157 points | 85 comments)
25. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (116 points | 66 comments)
26. The report for the 2024 security audit of the Mullvad app is now available (18 points | 1 comment)
27. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (51 points | 15 comments)
28. The Myth of Bananaland (143 points | 102 comments)
29. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (153 points | 47 comments)
30. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (372 points | 240 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
